hero.title: Wolfram Birkmayer
hero.subtitle: Product Development & Engineering - stabilized, transformed, scaled.

about.title: Experienced Interim executive for Product Development & Engineering
about.text1: As an interim executive, I support companies in stabilizing, transforming, and scaling the development and series production of their products, as well as their operational safety and reliability - drawing on solid aerospace expertise and international leadership experience at Airbus and Rolls-Royce in engineering, systems development, and project management.
about.text2: I am specialized in agile transformation, process optimization, change management, crisis resolution, and building high-performance teams. With my strategic mindset, deep technical expertise, and as a strong communicator I combine leadership excellence with engineering depth and transformation skills, even in highly regulated industries.
about.text3: The result: reliable, safe, and defect-free products - with shorter time-to-market, lower product and service costs, and higher customer satisfaction.

project1.title: Aircraft Final Assembly Line Performance Improvement
project1.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project1.text: On-time-delivery raised from 25% to 100% within 10 months with parallel to production rate scaling from 64->74 aircraft/year; Assembly related quality issues and claims reduced by up to 75%

project2.title: Competence Development for Safety Critical Systems
project2.subtitle: Industrial Corporation, 350.000 Staff, EUR 76B Revenue
project2.text: The lead time to define the key safety requirements was reduced by 75%, substantially de-risking certification and accelerating the market entry of this groundbreaking technology.

project3.title: Strategic Reorientation of the Engineering Organization
project3.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project3.text: Enabled scalable growth of engineering organization for the development of two additional aircraft types (A400M, A350) in the following 10 years.

project4.title: Industrialization of a new electrical technology for aircraft
project4.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project4.text: Through new guidelines the aircraft weight was reduced by 700 kg and the unit cost was reduced by 500.000 USD.

project5.title: Aircraft Systems Procurement Reorientation
project5.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project5.text: For the A350 all aircraft systems were procured with System contracts.

card1.title: Stabilize
card1.description: Restore operational capability and secure value streams. I take responsibility in technically critical or organizationally overloaded development and industrialization environments. The objective is to quickly return programs, products, or assembly operations back into a controlled, predictable state.
items: Restoration of schedule, quality, and cost control
Technical resolution of critical product or system issues
Immediate measures to secure development and assembly capability
Reorganization of teams, roles, leadership rituals, and decision-making paths

card2.title: Transform
card2.description: Increase efficiency, robustness, and product quality. I lead transformation initiatives that sustainably increase the performance of development, industrialization, or assembly organizations. This includes technical, organizational, and process oriented realignments.
items: Efficiency improvement in development, industrialization, or assembly
Re-engineering of products with high defect rates or field complaints
Introduction of robust, scalable development and industrialization processes
Optimization of technical decision logic, interfaces, and governance
Capability development and coaching of technical leaders

card3.title: Scale
card3.description: Systematically expand development and manufacturing capacity. I support companies that need to strategically align their product development and/or manufacturing for growth, new programs, or higher production volumes.
items: Establishment of scalable development and industrialization structures
Preparation for increased volumes, new product generations, or program launches
Process and tooling architecture for growing technical organizations
Introduction of control models that combine robustness and speed
Systematic development of workforce toward growth-capable teams

testimonial1.quote: For years the on-time-delivery of the A330/A340 Final Assembly Line was at 25%. Only thanks to Dr. Birkmayers encompassing competence the team could raise it to 100% in only 10 months.
testimonial1.name: Karl-Heinz Hartmann
testimonial1.company: Airbus Commercial Aircraft, Executive Vice President Operations

testimonial2.quote: Wolfram Birkmayer stands for clear leadership, strong technical expertise, and reliable results—even under highly demanding conditions. He was a highly respected and trusted point of contact for both senior management and teams.
testimonial2.name: Benjamin Bräutigam
testimonial2.company: Rolls-Royce Electrical, Former Head of Commuter Aircraft Program

testimonial3.quote: Wolfram Birkmayer combines deep safety and engineering expertise with clear accountability and strong execution capability. He leads interdisciplinary teams with confidence even under high pressure, builds trust with stakeholders, and delivers high-quality, pragmatic solutions in highly dynamic aerospace projects.
testimonial3.name: Max Scheulen
testimonial3.company: Rolls-Royce Electrical, Head of Global Architecture and Safety

quote.text: Successful products are not created by good design alone, but by clear leadership, capable teams, and disciplined execution—especially when stabilization, transformation, or scaling is required.
quote.author: Wolfram Birkmayer
